Package database

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseInterface
    Wrapper for the database to separate its implementation from other aspects of the program.
    DBMapLoader
    Loads maps into the database.
    GameInfo
    Contains all essential game information such as map, speed, game winner
    Hash
    Abstract Hash class that provides salt generation and contains an abstract hash method.
    MapGenerator
    Development class for generating Maps files in Binary format.
    MapLoader
    Class which allows subclasses to load specific maps with game information.
    SHA256Hash
    Implementation of the abstract Hash class, using the SHA-256 Algorithm (of the SHA-2 family) It alternates between appending and prepending the salt, over many iterations in order to increase difficulty in brute-forcing the password.
    SQLiteInterface
    Important class which queries the database for login, map, and statistics.
    User
    Class creates a User object which has many useful methods for getting important information such as login info as well as statistics.
    UserStatistics
    Contains user statistics necessary for tracking wins, losses, and games played.
